website_summaries.verdict: Choose this one if you want something unique to wear to an ugly sweater party without dealing with typical sweater material.
pros: Available in choice of funny holiday-themed prints and phrases
Consumers who find sweaters too warm or itchy will appreciate the soft, cotton-fleece blend and lightweight feel
cons: You may want to considering ordering up in size because it fits small
It may also be short on some individuals

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, just watch sizing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sweater! I bought it for a staff holiday party and bought a large because I wanted to wear it as an oversized sweater with leggings and boots. The large ended up fitting as a regular shirt. So if you want the whole oversized or baggy look I'd recommend going one to two sizes over. I am 5'1" and 160lbs and am a 38D.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Glitter
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'7 and 180lbs and am wear an XL which is a little snug. I have other hanes sweatshirts, so in comparison this definitely runs small. The pros are that the inside is super soft, and the glittery font is very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Bree C.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Cute sweatshirt, good quality. This shirt actually looks better in person than in the picture. (Brighter colors). Bought this on sale for less than $6. Would definitely recommend. - even at twice the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sweater. It has the comfort of a sweatshirt while looking a little bit nicer like a regular sweater. I bought a size medium and it fits perfectly. If I wanted a more formfitting look I could have also gotten the small. I definitely would recommend this sweater. I plan on wearing it for my fifth grade students’ winter choir concert.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie LaMendola

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but tight in sleeves and short in torso
customer_reviews.text: Got a L to fit 5'3'' 135 lbs frame. A little too tight around the sleeves and it was short. If you like the baggy look and feel, definitely go up a size or two. The print is really nice, though.
customer_reviews.author: Z. King

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: So cute!!! I purchased 3 of these sweatshirts and love them all!! One I got in an xl, the other 2 in medium and although the fits are different I love them all. I am 5'2" and about 106 lbs. The xl is over sized and looks adorable, you can do a slight front tuck if you want to, but I absolutely love the oversized look. The mediums fit normally and are very wearable. Loose fitting, not the tight bands around the waist or wrists which I hate. Lighter weight and not scratchy but not the super soft ones either. I think these are great sweatshirts!
customer_reviews.author: SERENDIPITY

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Seasonal Sweatshirt
customer_reviews.text: This sweatshirt is a true emerald green with beautiful shimmering snowflakes. This sweater did not shrink when washed and hang dried. Purchased for relative - but this XL size fits a under a size 16. So if you are normally an XL, I'd recommend going up a size. Reordered in a 2X and it fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn C.

customer_reviews.title: Its the Cat's Meow or is it Ho Ho Ho...Holiday Festive Sweatshirt!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 yo daughter loves her new Christmas sweater. She is 5'5" and about 110lb. I purchased a medium for her and it fits perfectly. The cat's Santa hat and sweater are flocked so it feels fuzzy and the white brim around the hat has a textural raised surface. The colors on the art is bright and festive. The cats eyes are very green and captivating. She and I love it! This is really fun sweatshirt for the holiday season,
customer_reviews.author: Tutu's Attic Las Vegas

customer_reviews.title: So soft and warm!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the design on this Christmas sweater so I decided to get it. When it arrived, I didn’t expect the inside of the sweater to be so soft and warm! No more itchy, ugly Christmas sweaters!!! The design on the front is so cute that I will be wearing it even after Christmas season ends. I will definitely be buying more from Hanes!
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the "Baby it's cold outside" design and it's so pretty! The sweater is soft, cozy and true to size. It leaves some room so it isn't tight, but it isn't baggy. For reference I am 5'7" 115 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Christmas Sweatshirt
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 'Let it Snow' pattern. The pattern itself looks exactly like the photo, but what is hard to tell from the photo is that some of the print is glittery silver. This makes the real sweatshirt look better than the photo. Other than that, the material is a bit thin and the cut is slightly awkward.
customer_reviews.author: green_tea

customer_reviews.title: Not as long as I wanted it to be, and I even sized up.
customer_reviews.text: If I had spent more than $9 on this sweatshirt, I would be sending it back. It is very short waisted. I thought the fit was a little weird, but I washed it and stretched it out so I think it will work for the 1-2 times a year I plan to wear it. I was wanting something to wear throughout the whole holiday season, but this will probably only be used for Christmas parties. For reference I am 5'8" and typically a size 14-16. I ordered a XXL but could have done with an XL as the shirt wasn't long enough anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Cute cat sweater.
customer_reviews.text: The sweater is super adorable but it’s a little snug and the arm length and where it falls on your waist could be longer.
customer_reviews.author: Angelle225

customer_reviews.title: Just as cute as pictured!!
customer_reviews.text: Just as cute as the picture- can't wait to wear at Christmas! I would have ordered Medium (since I prefer baggy over tight), but they were out of stock, so I got the small, and it fits fine. I am 5'2 about 112# (mainly in my stomach!) - and the small does fit ok. Fits exactly the way you would expect a Hanes Sweatshirt to fit. Perfect sweatshirt for cat lovers -- BUT I would consider it a"CUTE" Christmas Sweater not an "UGLY"Christmas Sweater!!!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: boxy and stiff basic sweatshirt
customer_reviews.text: This is a sweatshirt -- not a sweater (several reviews call it a sweater). The image is looks like a cross stitch, but it's a printed image. The design is cute, my issue is more with the sweatshirt. This is just a typical, basic hanes sweatshirt, which is fine if you know what to expect, but felt boxy and stiff when I put it on. It works for the one day a year I will wear it.
customer_reviews.author: JuleNY

customer_reviews.title: Great holiday sweater!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sweater a few days before an Ugly Christmas sweater party. Buying it on prime was wonderful! The sweater is very comfy and worked great for the theme. I read other reviews saying that the sweaters ran small so I ordered a size up and I'm glad I did because it fit perfectly when I did that. Very happy with the product and cheap price 😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap ugly sweater
customer_reviews.text: I needed an ugly holiday sweater for a work party and I'm too cheap to buy some of these $30 ones at target. This fit my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: A Little Small but Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an ugly sweater Christmas party and it did its job. It fit a little tighter than I would have liked (I'm 5'10 with a larger bust) but I only needed it for this one occasion. After I washed it, it shrunk a little more so I probably won't be wearing it again. I'll most like it give it away to someone with a smaller build.
customer_reviews.author: Bsgurl49

customer_reviews.title: Would've liked a little more room in this
customer_reviews.text: Would've liked a little more room in this, and there was no space for layering underneath, unless you order the next size up. My friend is more of a medium and she ordered it one size up and had room to layer. Price was great, and I wasn't expecting GREAT quality at this price, but it was fine for the Ugly Christmas Sweater Party we were attending.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: A little too small
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute sweatshirt. However, it fits like something my teenage daughter would wear. In other words, it's not a sweatshirt that "normal" sized for an adult that likes sweatshirts to cover their waist comfortably. I'm usually a small and ordered a small. It's just too small, not just because it's short, but because it's too small all over. If I were to order this again, I would order a medium. I plan on giving this one to my teenager daughter instead of keeping it for myself. If she doesn't want it, I'll send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Katie D

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: Cute for Christmas but too short. Other reviewers commented on that but I hoped it wouldn’t be on me. I got medium, I’m 5’6” 140 lbs and it fits good everywhere except in length. I won’t wear a longer shirt underneath, defeats the purpose of wearing a sweatshirt, so isn’t wearable unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: mktsff12

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but runs extremely small
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Runs very small. Like 2-3 sizes too small. Very short sweatshirt as well.
customer_reviews.author: LMW

customer_reviews.title: Okay for price
customer_reviews.text: It does run short. It's more crop top than sweater. Cute design. As long as you wear a shirt under like the picture shows the length is not an issue. I'm 5'9" and it just came to the top of my jeans. The sleeves were a tad short for long arms. Once layered over a shirt and sleeves scrunched up a bit it was okay.
customer_reviews.author: PuddzeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Baby It's cold Outside!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a large, but ordered xl so I could layer underneath. Beautiful sweatshirt! Does not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is so soft inside and out. Very few sweaters have fleece as the interior "lining" which feels so wonderful against the body.
customer_reviews.author: Shamrock

customer_reviews.title: Ugly Sweatshirt, not so ugly
customer_reviews.text: This sweatshirt (it's a sweatshirt, not sweater) was so cute and super comfortable! I can say that if you size up because you want it longer, that won't work. It gets wider the larger size you get, but basically stays the same length. It was perfect for my family's ugly sweater Christmas contest. I didn't win the contest because it's actually more cute, than ugly! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Megan M Keller

customer_reviews.title: Nothing ugly about this lovely Hanes sweatshirt, it's very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Hanes is always a quality product and this sweatshirt is really nice, super comfortable. I don't wear logo type clothing but this had a perfect holiday message "I'm in it for the Cookies" because I traveled on Christmas Eve, wore it under my parka on flight up North to spend Christmas with my family. My "kids" make the best cookies! Thank you Hanes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as ugly as you would think
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a generic sweatshirt. Very comfortable though and light weight. Washes well with very little shrinkage. Durable. i drive a bus which can get dirty from the steering wheel rubbing on it all day but the color blends
customer_reviews.author: Kielha

customer_reviews.title: The design is very good quality and it's pretty cute
customer_reviews.text: The design is very good quality and it's pretty cute, however, the sweater is a little short. I bought an XL because I like baggy sweaters but this was oddly wide and the upper arm area of the sleeves are a lot more baggy than the forearm area. I'm 5'9" and I have a long torso, the sweater reaches a bit above my hips, which to me is odd since it is an XL.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: This sweatshirt is realllly thick and warm! I got ...
customer_reviews.text: This sweatshirt is realllly thick and warm! I got it for an "ugly Christmas sweater" party and it's really not at all ugly, it's actually quite cute. I'm obsessed with cats so it was a fitting choice for me. I am 5'5", 133 lbs and got a medium and it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute sweater, but the XXL I ordered as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute sweater, but the XXL I ordered as I wanted it to be bulky is SMALLER than all the larges I have in my closet. I guess I'll give it away to a child as it is clearly not a woman's size?
customer_reviews.author: Minda Stuthman

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an XL, but I ordered a 2XL hoping for a baggy fit. However, the 2XL barely fit. This sweatshirt definitely runs a size small. Otherwise, it was cute and I was happy.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Sizes true to size
customer_reviews.text: The size was the right one for what I would normally buy her.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Perry Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great price, good quality and fit!
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable sweatshirt. Good quality. Fits as described. Would buy another. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D. Paynter

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: This was great and super soft. My only issue is that it fit a little smaller than the rest of my Haines sweatshirts. I bought the xxl because I wanted it oversized and it fit exactly the same as my xl. Still great.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Price

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas sweatshirt!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Christmas sweatshirt. It has a really cute design and is not too flashy.km. The fit is good too. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia P

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The sweater was exactly what I expected and served its purpose for a work party. It washed and dried without a problem. The fabric is very soft on the inside. I bought an XL so there was extra room and no fear of fitting tightly at work. There was definitely no shape to me in it but, that was what I expected with an XL, as I am normally a medium.
customer_reviews.author: DGrontas

customer_reviews.title: Cute holiday sweater
customer_reviews.text: This sweater was actually cuter than I expected. Fits well. A little on the short and wide side, but not too much where it makes a big difference. The bottom is not fitted, which is a little dissapointinf. The glitter does not come off, which is very nice. It is a nice, vibrant red, just as pictured. Cute holiday sweater! And very cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs a touch small in my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and comfy but I am 5’1 108 lbs and a small was close to being too small for how I prefer to wear sweat shirts. I will not be drying this one! So excited for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina VerHey

customer_reviews.title: Grumpy Holiday Himalayan Cat
customer_reviews.text: Having been an adoptee companion to a Himalayan cat this sweater touches my heart! I love it! It is beautifully made and I don’t think it’s an ugly holiday sweater at all!
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and soft!
customer_reviews.text: This sweatshirt fits fine and is comfy. I paired it with a white turtleneck and it looked decent enough to wear for a casual dress day at work during the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Denys T.

customer_reviews.title: I've been good this year...mostly! ;)
customer_reviews.text: I was worried it might run small, but the feedback I received from previous customers was helpful in making my decision to purchase it. Glad that I did! :-) It's super cute and I can't wait to wear it to our holiday luncheon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was super cute and perfect for the Christmas party I had ...
customer_reviews.text: This was super cute and perfect for the Christmas party I had to attend! :) Thank you! It was a bit smaller than I had expected, but only by a fraction, and that was mostly that the bottom of my shirt was a little higher than expected and I had to carefully think through when to and not to stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but length runs short
customer_reviews.text: Wish the sweatshirt was longer. It stops just at the waist. Explains why the model in the picture is wearing a blouse underneath the sweatshirt
customer_reviews.author: Coccoyng

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the photo!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, the words have fantastic color in person. Looks like the photo. I have worn it many times since I ordered it a couple of weeks ago and it is holding up great. I washed it on a gentle setting, inside out, just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Comfortable Sweater
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for a 5' 3" 110 lb. person. Very comfortable and not scratchy like some sweaters. It's soft and not too heavy, perfect for layering.
customer_reviews.author: Austinite

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but order one size up
customer_reviews.text: Super cute sweater but runs small. I'm usually a medium but ordered a large after reading the reviews. The large fit fine. A tad tight at the wrist but for this price, I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: NOT a sweater and TOO small
customer_reviews.text: The graphic was funny. My fault for not reading properly and realizing it was a sweatshirt and not a sweater. I had searched for "ugly Christmas sweaters" so not sure why this showed up in the list of offerings. I might have kept it, but it was sized to small and the graphic would have washed off over time. That's what you get for $9.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia S.

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty ugly and is a weird boxy shape. Good news is that Amazon gave me a refund without requiring a return. I gave it to Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: PTW

customer_reviews.title: Cut large
customer_reviews.text: Nice sweatshirt! Runs large. Even though 50/50 cotton and polyester, it did not shrink much. It's a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: NancyAW

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Sweatshirt at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a sweatshirt, not a sweater. My sister (whose name is Hope) loves it and wore it for three days straight after I gave it to her. She is teeny tiny and the small fit her perfectly for a sweatshirt. Color and imprint are well done and it’s a nice “tacky” shirt for the holidays
customer_reviews.author: Free Advice

customer_reviews.title: Very Generous Fit!
customer_reviews.text: A lot too large. Based on chart, bought 2x. Could have gone with xl. Will keep and give to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Runnels

customer_reviews.title: It looked huge when it arrived but fit great!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size bigger than I thought I was so I had extra room. It looked huge when it arrived but fit great!!! Roomy without being too baggy. It's not overly long so it's not the kind of sweatshirt you can wear with leggings but it's really cute with jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Rose

customer_reviews.title: It works, typical Hane's sizing though
customer_reviews.text: As with every other Hanes sweatshirt I've bought, I had to buy a size larger than normal and the sleeve and shirt itself are oddly short. The print is nice though
customer_reviews.author: peachiekeen 11

customer_reviews.title: Just a sweatshirt
customer_reviews.text: Just a sweatshirt - no cute plaid shirt underneath. Cute graphic, quality material without being too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rand

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Short and wide... model has perfect idea of layering a longer button down under it.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkadot

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute sweatshirt! It actually looks better in person than in the pictures! I’m usually a large in sweatshirts but I sized one up for a more loose fit and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Bordonaro

customer_reviews.title: Good product and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for ugly sweater party to add decorations to and it worked perfect. I usually wear a medium and went a size up and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Super fun Christmas sweatshirt.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a medium but ordered a large and I think it's perfect. A medium would've worked but I don't like sweatshirts to be snug. The large gives me room to move without looking oversized. The inside is very soft and the printing quality was great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Minnemama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This fit well and was perfect for Christmas sweater day at work. I received several compliments and I'm pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Fits small... LOT of pillng going on; so material not very good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Wrong sweater. Poor quality. Way too small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a small... apparently these must youth sizes. Sub-par quality, and I received the wrong sweater. Ordered the cat sweater, and received a different one. Returning, and not buying another.
customer_reviews.author: C.J. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Festive and comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this top for Christmas Eve... The color green is perfect and it was very soft and comfortable. I like it very much!
customer_reviews.author: ria haus

customer_reviews.title: Cute Christmas sweatshirt.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is kind of small. I normally wear a small in all of my tops and feel fine, but this was snug. It's okay to wear once a year for Christmas. Print is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Keller

customer_reviews.title: and my mother loved it for a Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, and my mother loved it for a Christmas present, in the spirit of the “ugly Christmas sweater” tradition. But it wasn’t really “ugly” at all, and actually was pretty cute. The fit was good. She’s a medium, and the medium fit well.
customer_reviews.author: CathyK

customer_reviews.title: Cool sweatshirt 5
customer_reviews.text: I should gave ordered a bigger size. Should have been a large. How it fits after I wash it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks better in person than it did online.  Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. It looks warm, and the snowflake pattern actually looks nicer than it does on the website. It fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute Sweatshirt
customer_reviews.text: This sweat shirt fits true to size. However, it is more like a crop shirt. It isn’t long it sits at waist. Very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Hula Gurl

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, cute design with glitter that doesn’t come off, nice material. Amazing deal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Alisia Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Short sleeves
customer_reviews.text: The design is cute for an ugly sweater. I loved it when I opened the box, but when I tried it on, the sleeves were really short and it's already quite bulky to get a bigger size. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Lu-

customer_reviews.title: size runs big.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sweatshirt really bought to have for next Christmas season. It is big. I am small person but thought med would be ok. Should have gotten small. But I will probably wear it anyway. I am pleased with the design!
customer_reviews.author: Lois Feranec

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite holiday sweatshirt!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable sweatshirt and amazing price. I got several compliments at a party, even from strangers.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Served its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality but it served its purpose. Didn’t want to spend a lot so the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Lillie

customer_reviews.title: A Not-So-Ugly Xmas Sweater
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to wear to a Xmas in July Ugly Sweater Party and it was really cute! The fit was perfect- not too baggy or tight. Will definitely be wearing this again come December!
customer_reviews.author: Leila

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed wore this shirt for the first time today to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed wore this shirt for the first time today to discover a hole in the sleeve. Not on the seam! This is a very cheaply made item. I would not recommend it. Shame I was very excited about it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cute and a lil snug
customer_reviews.text: A bit on the small side with not a lot of stretch. To give you context, I’m 5’0”, 107 lbs, and normally wear 0/XS. I ordered the Small and wish I had ordered a Medium or Large. It’s cute charming though, especially with a red collared shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sweater! Received many compliments on it, and after washing the glittery snowflakes are still pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Allen

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shirt .. Very soft from the inside it keep you warm ... Love it ..
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: ... cute for the holidays for those of us who hate sweaters. Definitely follow the other reviews and order ...
customer_reviews.text: So cute for the holidays for those of us who hate sweaters. Definitely follow the other reviews and order bigger-- I'm usually a large and got an XL. Fits perfect, even a little snug. Get the illusion of a sweater in a sweatshirt.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an xxl so I ordered an xxl and I was so happy it fit. Good material and not too thick.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not just for Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: Just what was described. More a winter sweatshirt, so I can wear it beyond Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sacco

customer_reviews.title: great sweater
customer_reviews.text: the size ran too for small. had return. I got my refund quick!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Bates

customer_reviews.title: Pilling after just one use
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. After just one use, I noticed pilling. I used this for an ugly sweater party, which kind of worked out given the condition. Fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Granda

customer_reviews.title: Cute and cozy.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable as cute “ugly” Christmas attire for a middle school teacher. Cozy. If worn just a few times per year, I think it will last and wear well for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: TommiAnn Tromm

customer_reviews.title: Wish it fit better
customer_reviews.text: Runs very small. I wish I got a size up. It is very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Diane McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice weather feels warm and medium thick
customer_reviews.text: Looks great ordered a XXL I’m 4’11 160lbs and fits great true to size
customer_reviews.author: Ineedtogetoffamazon

customer_reviews.title: Love this sweatshirt!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun sweatshirt to wear for casual holiday functions. Love how it fits, and is warm but not too bulky. Get a lot of chuckles from cat lovers.
customer_reviews.author: HoosierGirl

customer_reviews.title: i bought a large because I was worried it would ...
customer_reviews.text: i bought a large because I was worried it would be too tight or short on the arms. but actually, i could have used a medium (i am 5'7'' and 125 lbs). definitely fits as expected (according to US sizes)
customer_reviews.author: Samina Ali

customer_reviews.title: Holiday Sweat Shirt
customer_reviews.text: The design is pretty. For today's fashion I would have liked a more roomy fit.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an extra large sweatshirt and so I ordered this in XL as well. It was true to size for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lina girl

customer_reviews.title: Good sweater but too small
customer_reviews.text: Cute sweater but too small. I didn’t have time to return it and get another before Christmas. More of a light sweater, which is good :) not a big bulky thing.
customer_reviews.author: 88Seashell

customer_reviews.title: It is really cute and comfortable just wish the fit was better
customer_reviews.text: Reading the reviews I ordered a large I normally wear a medium. I wish I would have ordered an xl. I definitely won’t be putting this sweater in the dryer. It is really cute and comfortable just wish the fit was better.
customer_reviews.author: Unicorn queen

customer_reviews.title: Not a true Hanes Just My Size item
customer_reviews.text: Extremely tight and definitely not a true Hanes Just My Size shirt
customer_reviews.author: mazd1970

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Will be back to purchase more for next year! Be sure to size up.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: nice light weight sweatshirt
customer_reviews.text: The color and look are what was shown. It is soft and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: J. DiGrigoli

customer_reviews.title: So super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is the one instance I am so happy I ordered up a size. I am 5'7", if I would have ordered my normal size both the sleeves and torso would have been way too short. It is great not, but I do put it in the dryer. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: bloomie

customer_reviews.title: Cute Sweatshirt for the pruce
customer_reviews.text: Soft fabric but this sweatshirt doesn’t have a lot of give I order a size bigger
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! It was a gift and it was well ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! It was a gift and it was well received. The only problem is looking at the design up close it's hard to read. At a distance, it reads perfectly clear!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Wore to holiday party. Sweatshirt material. A little ...
customer_reviews.text: Wore to holiday party. Sweatshirt material. A little short at the waist but fit as expected otherwise. Also, the arms fit close. Could not push them up.
customer_reviews.author: jesswhetsrn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and was exactly as presented. I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: sandra j. kauffman

product_meta.title: Hanes Women's Ugly Christmas Sweatshirt
product_meta.description: Want to get Santa's attention slip into this cozy sweatshirt. You'll love its comfy feel and cute, colorful graphic. And you'll be glad to know it's made with up to 5 percent recycled polyester from plastic bottles
feature_bullets: Plush cotton-blend fleece keeps you warm without weighing you down
Stretchy mini-rib trim finishes cuffs and hem
Roomy, relaxed fit allows for easy layering
